name: Kaw!Losseum
description:
A rogue-lite wave survival game heavily inspired by games like 20 Minutes 'til Dawn and Risk of Rain. Fight off hordes of enemies and bosses while buying items from a shady shopkeeper to become more powerful. Can you beat the ducks and their army?

Over 50 unique items, 12 different characters with their own attacks and abilities, dozens of enemies and bosses, ducks, and more!

Join our discord! https://discord.gg/YCFwx3xE3C
